mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOB_DIARY ( JOB_DIARY_REPORT_DATE, JOB_DIARY_WRTING_EMPL_ID, JOB_DIARY_RECPTN_EMPL_ID, JOB_DIARY_SBJ, JOB_DIARY_CN ) VALUES ( TRUNC(SYSDATE), #{jobDiaryWrtingEmplId}, #{jobDiaryRecptnEmplId}, #{jobDiarySbj}, #{jobDiaryCn} )
mapper.select: SELECT JOB_DIARY_REPORT_DATE, EMPL_NM, JOB_DIARY_SBJ, JOB_DIARY_CN, JOB_DIARY_WRTING_EMPL_ID FROM JOB_DIARY J, EMPL E WHERE J.JOB_DIARY_WRTING_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID AND E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = #{commonCodeDept} ORDER BY JOB_DIARY_REPORT_DATE
